name: Duelity (CISAC, PedroBarbosa, Jeniwg, BigMadTy, inacioreina)
description:
Summary:

Pick up Power-Ups that increase one stat and reduce another to make yourself very fast, very tanky or very nimble by getting more stamina and being able to dodge more.

How high or low can you make your stats go?

Info:

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2022 - Duality, using the Godot Engine.
This is an updated version with many bug fixes and an endless mode.

Credits:
Bruno Tender - Programming
Carolina Costa - Programming, Art
Inácio Reina Maio - Programming, Art, Sound
Jenifer Lagoaça - Art
Pedro Barbosa - Programming

The controls can be found in-game by going into the Settings and opening the Controls tab.
Have fun!
